title: ngbaoson
author: ngbaoson
content: Welcome to IronFish Mining Pool @ LuckyPool.IOThis is TESTNET pool, not MAINNET. IRON mined on TESTNET pool will not have any value. The purpose of pool right now is help you setup your rigs, find out best OC valuesIronFish MAINNET will go live on 20 April, 2023. Pool will reset stats and start on MAINNET at the same timePool UI: https://ironfish.luckypool.ioStratum: ironfish.luckypool.ioPorts:9966: CPU, 1-2 GPU9977: 3-5 GPU9988: 6-8 GPU9999: NiceHash, MRRAlgo: blake3_ironfish, can dual mine with ethashMiners app: SRBMiner MULTI, bzMiner, Rigel0% Pool Fee until Aug 1, 2023Pool features:Support mining with email (change any . to _), you can update payment address laterSupport worker, format WALLET.WORKERPer worker hashrate chartEmail notification when rig stop hashingCustom payout thresholdLow min payout: 1 IRON Reward distribution log Payment stats Discord support: https://discord.gg/v9M44DJHappy Mining
